subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Thursday could be the night that the Giants admit what is obvious to the rest of the football world: Odell Beckham Jr. is far and away the team’s best player, and it would be smart to get him the ball more often.
snippet: Thursday could be the night that the Giants admit what is obvious to the rest of the football world: Odell Beckham Jr. is far and away the team’s best player, and it would be smart to get him the ball more often.
